Text.Page:
Mission Orders

The Kazuur Syndicate's foothold in the Hungry Caverns must be broken.

Take out the {@LinkCreature:8#2011#armored hyenas}, {@LinkCreature:8#2031#gula slavers} and {@LinkCreature:8#2041#taskmasters}, {@LinkCreature:8#2021#caiman mercenaries} and {@LinkCreature:8#2042#guards}, {@LinkCreature:8#2051#devan acolytes}, and {@LinkCreature:8#2061#auric imps}.

Report to Zesine in Castanica when the mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
